original_text: David said, ‘No, my brothers. You cannot do that. The Lord has given all these things to us. He has kept us safe. He has helped us to win against the enemies who attacked us.
korean_text: 다윗이 이르되 나의 형제들아 여호와께서 우리를 보호하시고 우리를 치러 온 그 군대를 우리 손에 넘기셨은즉 그가 우리에게 주신 것을 너희가 이같이 못하리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord has given all these things to us
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 이 모든 것들을 우리에게 주셨다

sentences.original_text: He has helped us to win
against the enemies who attacked us
